org.apache.flink.hadoopcompatibility.mapred.record.example

Class WordCountWithOutputFormat.TokenizeLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.AbstractRichFunction
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.functions.MapFunction
        • org.apache.flink.hadoopcompatibility.mapred.record.example.WordCountWithOutputFormat.TokenizeLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Function, GenericCollectorMap<Record,Record>, RichFunction
    Enclosing class:
    WordCountWithOutputFormat

    public static class WordCountWithOutputFormat.TokenizeLine
extends MapFunction
implements Serializable
    Converts a Record containing one string in to multiple string/integer pairs. The string is tokenized by whitespaces. For each token a new record is emitted, where the token is the first field and an Integer(1) is the second field.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
